entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
